summary: Adds Fur Hide Armor as a craftable item.
descriptionHtml:
12 Morning Star 4E 202
         Erandur and I have been doing some work around Whiterun today and I bumped into Ysolda, who was looking fine. She wants to become a trader and I think I can help. I am after all a Thane of Whiterun. Looks like that Khajiit she was talking about just took the mammoth tusk and left town. We are meeting tonight at the Drunken Huntsman, everyone goes to the Mare and its crowded and noisy. Jenassa should be there too. She can be hired for 500 septims and she\'s up for anything so Erandur is taken care of. I just hope that Elrindir, the owner, doesn\'t spoil the party with his attitude. I\'ve found if you get a few bottles of mead in him and ask him the story of his brother mistaking him for a deer, he can be a fun guy. I like the Dunmer. Good people and it really bugs me this whole sons of Skyrim Ulfric Stormcloak revolution. I\'ve been meaning to get myself to Castle Dour and see if I can help Tullius kill this asshole.

update 1.2
the female armour has been redone to fix lighting issues and issues with clipping around the arms and the wy the armor moves on the body

ESP with loose files or BSA 
Craftable at any forge under Hide
Recipe is the same as Fur Armor
Console Name \"fur hide armor\"
Uses all vanilla textures so is compatible with HD textures
The poncho on female version uses Saviour\'s HIde Textures
author: Franklin Zunge
